tweet: No one should die from carbon monoxide at home! That’s why I introduced the Safe Housing for Families Act w/ @SenKamalaHarris & @JoeCunninghamSC to require CO detectors in @HUDgov housing, and why I joined @ChicagoRedCross & Cicero Fire Department to install these devices today. pic.twitter.com/3uX5bwfF48

En tiempos donde los derechos de la mujer están bajo ataque, me da esperanza ver a organizaciones como @NAPAWF trabajando para hacer cambios en la sociedad. Su agenda interseccional está basada en justicia económica y reproductiva.  ¡Gracias por su invaluable compromiso! pic.twitter.com/AcuKLKXGmj

In a time when women’s rights are under attack, I am hopeful to see organizations like @NAPAWF engaging in organizing and advocacy. They are actively advancing an intersectional agenda rooted in reproductive and economic justice. Thank you for your invaluable commitment! pic.twitter.com/iI3tkQt0dp
